steps.title: 1. Mandatory Requirements
steps.text: CNPJ/Tax ID, a clean phone number (no WhatsApp installed), and a Credit Card for Meta billing.

steps.title: 2. Meta Business Manager
steps.text: Access business.facebook.com and create your business account.

steps.title: 3. Developer App
steps.text: Go to developers.facebook.com, create a 'Business' app and name it after your company.

steps.title: 4. Set up WhatsApp
steps.text: Enable the WhatsApp product in your app dashboard and link it to your business account.

steps.title: 5. API Setup & IDs
steps.text: Inside 'API Setup', find your Phone Number ID and Account ID. Verify your phone number via SMS.

steps.title: 6. Permanent Access Token
steps.text: CRITICAL: Go to Business Settings > System Users. Generate a token with whatsapp_business_messaging permission. This token will never expire.

templates_guide.title: Message Templates
templates_guide.text: Go to the Template Manager and create these models:

items.name: welcome_message
items.content: Hello {{1}}! Welcome to {{2}}. How can we help you?
